text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.20.Mumps"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.20.Mumps

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.20.Mumps

title: IMMZ.DT.20.Mumps

status: draft

date: 2023-08-02 04:40:13+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated against Mumps, give Mumps vaccine

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT20

action

title: Immunize Patient for MUMPS - No Doses

description: Provide MUMPS immunizations - using the "MUMPS vaccine immunization - NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"MUMPS vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for MUMPS because no doses on 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 12text/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for MUMPS because no doses on 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country recognizes MUMPS reduction as a public health priority" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for MUMPS because no doses on 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.20.Mumps.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for MUMPS - 1 Dose given a month ago

description: Provide MUMPS immunizations - using the "MUMPS vaccine immunization - 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"MUMPS vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for MUMPS a second dose on a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last MUMPS dose given" >= "1 months"text/cqlShould vaccinate Patient for MUMPS a second dose on a 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.20.Mumps.02
